comment.author: 47186149@N08
comment._content: I had no idea the bombardment was so extensive. This photo is of interest to me as my parents came to live in this street 40years after this event. The street was behind Marine drive and was demolished in the late 1950s.

comment.author: 47908901@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/47186149@N08] 

Thanks for this bit of information, we will be able to add it to our records.
